data.title: Dell Acquires EqualLogic For $1.4 Billion
data.meta_description: Dell has acquired data storage solutions provider EqualLogic for $1.4 billion. New Hampshire based EqualLogic makes internet focused data-storage network
data.text:

Google is expected to announce four Pixel devices: the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL and Pixel 9 Pro Premium, running Android 15.
